Sunhawk:  I found another spot 8 miles South.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "airly2000" <airly2000@y...> wrote:
> Condor::
> 
> "Where we go???"asked Condor to Sunhawk
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., "dewboy30816" <dewboy30816@y...> wrote:
> > He got the equipment and headed back to that spot.
> >

> > > Sunhawk found another spot for a sensor 8 miles South of the 
> base, 
> > > and even though he was getting bored with the task he headed 
back 
> > to 
> > > the base to get the sensor equipment.
> > >
